channel.description: Recent content in Points on elliott.io

item.description: ![](_strategy.jpg) [**design**][1] noun …the art or action of conceiving of and producing such a plan or drawing… purpose, planning, or intention that exists or is thought to exist behind an action, fact, or material object… [**strategy**][2] noun ( pl. -gies) a plan of action or policy designed to achieve a major or overall aim… [1]: http://oxforddictionaries.com/view/entry/m_en_us1239718#m_en_us1239718 [2]: http://oxforddictionaries.com/view/entry/m_en_us1294847#m_en_us1294847
